entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
